commandDescription: Retrieves all the sources from an org
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for metadata files. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for csv files. Default: '%s'
orgFlagDescription: Specify the alias of the org
resnumbFlagDescription: Specify the maximum number of resources in a package. Default: '%s'
manifestFlagDescription: Optionally specify a package.xml to be downloaded
dontRetrieveFlagDescription: Optionally specify to not retrieve the sources. Default: '%s'
logdirFlagDescription: Optionally specify a dir for log files. Default: '%s'
splitMergeFlagDescription: Optionally specify if split and merge of all metadata must be run after retrieve. Default: '%s'
